title: ICE: no entry found for key

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(non_lifetime_binders)] #![crate_type = "lib"] fn b() where for [(); C]: Copy {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (9aa5c24b7 2023-02-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9aa5c24b7d763fb98d998819571128ff2eb8a3ca commit-date: 2023-02-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
